Article.Title: Web Services (Online and Offline data)
Article.Content:
To execute the web-service you will need a identification string. To get this - please register

Please refer to written documentation in english or norwegian. You may also find help studying the API Reference.

WSDL (will always link to the latest version). More information about WSDL/XML Schema.

We recommend soapUI to test the Web Service.

Please refer to common information regarding best practice, product codes and error codes.
